article_title: Elementary School's Playground Destroyed By Fire
article_text:
Sioux Falls, SD

Sioux Falls Fire Rescue put out a fire on the playground of Hawthorne Elementary Saturday afternoon that damaged the school.

Crews on the scene tell KELOLAND News that the fire started on the playground equipment, melting the plastic.

The heat from the fire also broke a window of the building. Smoke also damaged the school's roofline, and crews were looking closely to make sure the school didn't catch fire. There is no word yet on how it started, and no one was hurt.
